testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/register Should create new user account
Authentication tests Post /auth/register Should not create user account more than once
testcase.classname: Should not create user account more than once

testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/login Should not login user with unverified email
testcase.classname: Should not login user with unverified email

testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/login Should verify user email
Authentication tests Post /auth/login Should not login user with invalid email
testcase.classname: Should not login user with invalid email

testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/login Should not login user with invalid details
testcase.classname: Should not login user with invalid details

testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/activate/{userId} Should send an activation link email
testcase.classname: Should send an activation link email

testcase.name: Authentication tests Post /auth/activate/{userId} Should not send activation link to unavailable email
testcase.classname: Should not send activation link to unavailable email
